Maria tiene como meta ir creciendo y tener su propio copetin  brindando asi una mejor atencion a su familia. Tanto ella como su grupo esta contento por la ayuda que estan recibiendo.
texts.en:
Koeju is comprised of 20 women from the town of Luque. They always work very hard so that they can support their families.
Maria sells foodstuffs. She's married to Roberto, with whom she has three children. She requests the loan in order to purchase an electric cooker so she can save time and prepare her foodstuffs more conveniently. Maria's goal is to keep on growing and own her own eatery, so that she can take better care of her family. She and her group are both glad to get the help they're receiving.

loans.use: to purchase an electric cooker.

loans.name: Sandra Yamileth

texts.es: Sandra, tiene 22 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos, vive en la zona suburbana de San Pedro Sula. Ella vende todo tipo de mercadería desde hace 3 años, vende ropa, calzado, carteras, cosméticos, cortinas, etc.  Ha establecido un pequeño local enfrente a su casa, es un punto estratégico ya por allí transitan muchas personas y así logra vender sus productos. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería para mantener surtido el negocio y poder incrementar sus ingresos. Ella tiene como meta hacer crecer el negocio para ayudar a sus hijos con la educación y mejorar su calidad de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Sandra, age 22, is married and has three children.  She lives in a suburban area of San Pedro, Sula.

She has been selling all types of merchandise for three years.  She sells clothes, shoes, wallets, cosmetics, and curtains, etc.  She has established a small place in front of her house.  It is a strategic place because a lot of people pass by.  This is how she manages to sell her products.

She will use the loan she is requesting to buy merchandise.  She will do this to keep her business stocked and to be able to increase her income.  Her goal is to make her business grow in order to help her children with their education and to improve the family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her business.

loans.name: Leticia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Leticia, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, pues considera que a través de ellos está mejorando su negocio, pues le permite a través del recurso económico comprarse a mejor precio y cantidad los materiales, en esta ocasion invertira en harina, aceite, leña, azúcar, manteca, levadura, y otros materiales que son necesarios para la elaboración de pan, esta nueva inversión le dará mayor fortaleza para hacerle frente a la venta.
Ella ha tenido un efecto positivo con él uso del préstamo anterior, considera que está prosperando en el negocio, hasta el momento ha mantenido un nivel de producción bastante estable, sus ventas han sido buenas y esto le ha permitido tener una mejor solvencia en su familia.
texts.en:
Leticia is requesting a new loan.  She feels that her business is improving through the loans.  It allows her, through this financial resource, to buy at a better price and to buy the materials in bulk.

This time she will buy flour, cooking oil, firewood, sugar, lard, yeast, and other materials she needs to make bread.  This new investment will give her a greater advantage to get ahead of sales.

The use of the previous loan has had a positive impact.  She feels that she is prospering in the business.  So far she has kept the level of production quite stable.  Her sales have been good, and this has allowed her to have an improved financial solvency in her family.

loans.use: to buy flour, cooking oil, firewood, sugar, lard, yeast.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 32 años de edad, vive en la calurosa ciudad de Ica la cual se caracteriza por la amabilidad de sus pobladores, por su agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón Tanguis, esparrago, uva, paprika, entre otros; asimismo podemos encontrar la “Laguna de Huacachina”, la cual es visitada por muchos turistas en cualquier época del año. El vive al lado de su esposa la cual es su mano derecha y quien lo apoya mucho y junto a ella tiene un hijo de 7 años de edad a quien quiere mucho y sobre todo es por quien trabaja muy duro para darle una vida digna y sobre todo con mucho amor. A Pedro le gusta  mucho leer cuando dispone de un tiempo libre y sobre todo le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”. Pedro solo estudios hasta el quinto grado de secundaria debido a que sus padres no tenían muchos recursos económicos, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar para ser ingeniero de Sistemas.

Cada día Pedro trabaja como vigilante en una urbanización de su ciudad, Pedro cuida alrededor de 15 casas y  trabaja 10 horas al día, el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo que sus clientes han logrado tenerle mucha confianza.

Pedro está muy agradeció con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar una mejoras en su vivienda como refacción de puertas ya que esta es de calamina, asimismo, mejoramiento de tuberías de agua, mejoramiento de paredes, entre otros, asi de esta manera el podrá ir mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia y sobre todo brindarle más seguridad, con ello Pedro seguir trabajando para  seguir en busca de realizar su más  grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su casa propia y darle un buena calidad de vida a su familia”.
texts.en:
Pedro is 32 years old. He lives in the warm town of Ica, which is known for the friendliness of its inhabitants and for the agriculture, especially the Tanguis cotton, asparagus, grape and paprika crops, among others. The Huacachina Lagoon can also be found there, and it's visited by many tourists year-round. He lives by his wife's side; she's his right-hand person and gives him a lot of support. With her he has a 7-year-old son, whom he loves very much. His son is the main reason why he works very hard, so he can give him a life that is dignified and, above all, full of love. Pedro very much enjoys reading when he gets some free time, and most of all he loves to eat one of his favorite dishes, the delicious "arroz con pollo" (rice with chicken). Pedro only studied up to the fifth grade of middle school, because his parents didn't have much in the way of financial resources, but he would have liked to have studied to become a systems engineer.
Pedro works everyday as a security guard in an urban development of his town. Pedro looks after about 15 houses and works 10 hours a day. He believes that he does well in his job because he's very responsible and mainly because his clients have been able to put a lot of trust in him.
Pedro is very thankful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he will be able to make some home improvements, such as remodeling the doors which are made of corrugated iron. Also, he will improve the water pipes and the walls, among other things. That way he will be able to gradually improve his family's living conditions and above all provide them with more safety. Pedro will continue to work so he can keep on pursuing the realization of his biggest dream: "To finish building his own home and provide good living conditions for his family".

loans.use: to make home improvements (remodeling the doors as well as improving the water pipes and the walls, among other things).

loans.name: Philis

texts.en: Philis is 37 years old and hardworking. To earn a living, she has operated a hardware business for seven years and has one employee. Besides that, she also does pig farming. Since she became a client of Faulu Kenya, she has become a disciplined saver because she has been trained on financial management. She hopes to grow her business in five years. She needs a loan of 50,000 KES to buy paint.

loans.use: to buy paint for her hardware business.

loans.name: Janice Ann

texts.en:
Janice Ann is 31 years old and lives in Baybay, Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has three children. 
Janice Ann sells seafood/crustaceans for a living and has been doing this for nine years. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy seafood/crustaceans for her business. 
Janice Ann has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, she hopes to improve her family's living conditions by using the profits from buying and selling seafood/crustaceans.

loans.use: to buy seafood to sell in her business.

loans.name: Edith

texts.en:
Edith is 35 years old and lives in the town of Kasubi in the Kampala east region of Uganda. She is married and has three children with two of them currently in school. For the past eight years, Edith has been working hard to manage her salon, which does hairdressing. 

To help expand her business, Edith has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more hair styles, and will help Edith to generate greater profits and manage to build her residential house. Edith hopes that in the future she will be able to expand the business into a training school for hairdressing. 

Edith is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Edith who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more hair styles for her salon.

loans.name: Berthilde

texts.en: Berthilde is 45 years old. She is a widow with six children ages 10 to 25. She has been selling foodstuffs for the past five years. She has requested a loan to buy more peanuts, tomatoes and onions to resell.

loans.use: to buy peanuts, tomatoes and onions to sell.

loans.name: Manantial Group

texts.es:
Este grupo surgió por contacto de una de las integrantes con la fundación, trabajan juntas desde el año 2010, y actualmente  se encuentran  en el 6º ciclo, donde todas trabajan dentro de un ambiente de respeto y ayuda mutua.
Cuenta la Sra. María  que solicita crédito para la compra de comestibles en general para surtir su negocio, como ser bebidas, enlatados, lácteos, panificados y demás, ya que ella tiene una despensa, donde atiende y surte a la mayoría de sus vecinos y personas de zonas aledañas. Ella se encuentra  muy agradecida ya que gracias a esta ayuda que recibe puede mejorar sus ingresos y el de su familia.
texts.en:
This group emerged after one of its members contacted Fundación Paraguaya. They have worked together since 2010 and are currently in their sixth loan cycle. The members are able to proceed with their work in an atmosphere of respect and mutual support.

Sra. María is requesting a loan in order to buy general food products to restock her business such as beverages, canned goods, dairy products, baked goods, and other products. She manages a food pantry where most of the customers she serves are neighbors and people from the surrounding neighborhoods. María is very appreciative of the help she will receive so that she can improve her income and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy beverages, canned goods, dairy products, baked goods, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sodas, juices, sweets and snacks.

loans.name: Rosa Vilma

texts.es:
Rosa, está solicitando un préstamo, por que considera necesario realizar el fortalecimiento en la obtención de mercadería como azúcar, huevos, aceite, arroz, frijol, que le servirán para surtir el negocio, dándole la oportunidad de generar buenas ventas.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior, fue positivo, que le permitió tener más surtido el negocio, su condición familiar manifiesta que está cambiando, debido al buen funcionamiento del negocio.
texts.en:
Rosa is asking for this loan, as she feels it is necessary to increase the inventory of her business. She will purchase items such as sugar, oil, rice and beans that she will use to provide a greater variety of products for her customers. This will allow her to improve her sales.
With the last loan, she had a positive result. It allowed her to have a greater variety of goods for her business. She can see that the conditions for her family are changing because of the success of her business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, eggs, oil, rice and beans.

loans.name: Evariste

texts.en:
Evariste is 44 years old and is married with five children between the ages of 5 and 18. He sells shoes, clothes, bags etc. Evariste has four years of experience in this work and he currently employs one person to help him. The hours of his business are from 6 a.m to 6.30 p.m every week day. 

Evariste has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy various goods such as shoes, clothes and bags for resale. With any profits, he will be able to save money for his future and to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy various goods such as shoes, clothes and bags for resale.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es: Nelly de 62 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración de pasteles, plato típico colombiano, que consiste en un amasijo de masa o arroz, preparado con verduras, carnes y otros ingredientes envueltos en hojas de bijao, atado con un ico y sometido a la cocción. Este negocio es producto de la tradición de su madre quien trabajó en este oficio durante muchos años y cuando esta falleció, Nelly continuó con su negocio. En esta microempresa trabajan varios de sus familiares que se encargan de la preparación del alimento y distribución comercial del producto. Gracias a esta actividad Nelly ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia y hoy tiene su casa propia y se siente realizada como mujer y persona importante en su familia. Su meta es continuar trabajando incansablemente para conseguir cada vez mas bienestar y felicidad para su  misma y para su familia. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará al por mayor materias primas para elaborar pasteles como arroz, aceitunas, alcaparra, carne, pollo, cerdo y verduras y abordar un mercado potencial que espera conquistar con calidad de sus productos y buenos precios.
texts.en: 62-year-old Nelly makes "pasteles", a typical Colombian pastry consisting of a mixture of dough or rice with vegetables, meat and other ingredients, which are wrapped in bijao leaves (similar to banana leaves), tied and then cooked. This business is a result of the tradition started by her mother, who remained in this line of work for many years and, when she passed away, Nelly carried on with her business. Many of her family members work in this micro-enterprise; they're in charge of food preparation and commercial distribution of the products. Thanks to this business Nelly has succeeded in getting her family ahead. Today she owns a house of her own and feels like an accomplished woman and an important member of her family. Her goal is to keep on working tirelessly in order to achieve more and more happiness and well-being for herself and for her family. She's currently requesting a Kiva loan, her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use it to purchase wholesale supplies for making "pasteles", such as rice, olives, capers, meat, chicken, pork and vegetables. She will take on a potential market which she hopes to conquer with the quality of her products and her good prices.

loans.use: to purchase rice, olives, capers, meat, chicken, pork and vegetables.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is 30 years old and lives in the town of Bulenga in the Kampala west region of Uganda. She is married and has three children, two currently in school. For the past two years, Mariam has been working hard to manage her small business, which sells hardware items such as iron sheets. 

To help expand her business, Mariam has requested a loan of 3000000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more iron sheets for resale, and will help Mariam to generate greater profits and improve her business. Mariam hopes that in the future she will be able to increase the success of her business. 

Mariam is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Mariam who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more iron sheets for resale.

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es:
Oscar, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, porque tiene la necesidad de comprarse los insumos agrícolas y poder iniciar la siembra de maíz, se comprara abono, insecticidas, pesticidas, que le ayudan a la plantación a prevenirla de las plagas y aumenta su producción.
Considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo a mejorar su producción en el cultivo, pues obtuvo una buena cosecha, esto le ha beneficiado a su familia teniendo lo necesario para la alimentación y cubrir algunas necesidades.
texts.en:
Oscar is requesting a new loan, because he needs to buy farming supplies so he can begin sowing corn. He will purchase compost, insecticide and pesticide, which help him protect his crop from pests and increase his production.
He believes that the previous loan helped him improve production in his crop, because he had a good harvest. This has benefitted his family, who had what they needed for food and for covering some of their needs.

loans.use: to purchase compost, insecticide and pesticide.

loans.name: Jose Obdulio

texts.es:
José, se dedica a la siembra de maíz, vive con su esposa y un hijo, él trabaja desde hace dos años en la siembra de maíz y tambien trabaja como motorista de un microbús, con estas actividades ha logrado tener lo necesario como fuente de ingreso para su familia.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos para el cultivo de maíz, como lo son abono, herbicidas, y otros materiales que le ayudan en el proceso del cultivo, esto le ayudara a mejorar las posibilidades de tener una cosecha sana y abundante.
El objetivo de José es tener una buena experiencia con su préstamo, poder mejorar la producción del cultivo, además tiene a futuro la compra de un microbús.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and child and makes a living growing corn. He has worked growing corn for two years and also works as a minibus driver. With these businesses, he has succeeded in obtaining a sufficient source of income for his family. 

José is seeking a loan for the purchase of supplies for the growing of corn, which include fertilizer, herbicides and other supplies that help him in the cultivation process. This would help him to improve the likelihood of having a wholesome and abundant harvest. José's goal is to have a good experience with his loan, to be able to improve his agricultural production and hopes in the future to purchase a minibus.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Atyrkul

texts.ru:
Атыркул 61 год, вдова, воспитала 2 детей. Атыркул с 2005 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Атыркул,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется 2 дойные коровы с приплодом и 7 овец, продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит около 5,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Атыркул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку овец для откорма их на пастбищах, что позволит уменьшить расходы на корм.  Доходы от кредита Атыркул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Atykul is 61 years old, she is a widow and has raised two children. Atykul has been involved in animal husbandry since 2005 and has started this business with an amount of 5,000 som (KGS). Because of her hard work Atykul now has two milk cows with calves and seven sheep as well as the sale of milk and dairy products which brings around 5,000 som a month.

With the goal to further grow her business Atykul has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 20,000 KGS to buy sheep for grazing on the fields which will allow her to decrease the expenses on fodder. She plans to invest the income from the loan into further growth of her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Aliou

texts.fr: Aliou est un homme marié.Il est père de quatre enfants qui fréquentent tous l'école.En plus de ses activités dans l'administration, il pratique l'élevage à domicile notamment l'embouche bovine.Il achète des bœufs qu'il engraisse puis revend au bout de sept mois.Cette activité lui rapporte des revenus assez consistants qui lui permettent de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et à ses propres besoins.Il sollicite un pret de 250000f pour acheter un bœuf.Son ambition est de développer ses capacités d'embouche.
texts.en:
Aliou is a married man and a father of four children who all attend school. In addition to his work in administration, he is a livestock farmer at home, particularly in the raising of cattle. He buys steers which he fattens and then resells after seven months. This business brings in revenues substantial enough to enable him to support his family and himself.

He is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs to buy a steer. His ambition is to develop his capacity to raise livestock.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Dionisio

texts.es:
Dionisio es un hombre de 47 años, se encuentra felizmente casado, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, con su esposa y sus 2 hijos, cuyas edades son de 14 y 12 hijos, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones prepara uno de sus platos favoritos como es el delicioso “Seco con Frejoles”; Dionisio siempre ha sido un hombre muy emprendedor que ha trabajado desde muy joven, lamentablemente por la necesidad de solventar sus gastos y ayudar a sus padres, no pudo culminar sus estudios primarios, pero le gustaría poder concluirlos algún día.
Por iniciativa propia y gracias a su entusiasmo y al apoyo de su familia, Dionisio puso en marcha su negocio de cultivo de tuna donde trabaja un aproximado de 10 horas diariamente, él se siente muy a gusto con su negocio ya que siempre le ha gustado el campo y el trabajo que se realiza en él. 
Dionisio se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos para la infesta de cochinilla a todo su cultivo de tuna, de esta manera podrá aprovechar la estación y obtendrá abundante cría de cochinilla, así cuando la cosecha de su cultivo termine, podrá obtener buenas ganancias de las ventas realizadas, favoreciendo de esta manera a que poco a poco Dionisio pueda cumplir su gran sueño de brindar una mejor calidad de vida para su querida familia.
texts.en:
Dionisio is a 47-year-old man who is happily married. He lives in the town of Nazca with his wife and two children aged 14 and 12. When he has free time, he enjoys to read for a bit and on some occasions he prepares one of his favorite dishes, such as the delicious "seco con frejoles" (marinated lamb with beans). Dionisio has always been a very enterprising man who has worked since he was very young. Unfortunately, due to the need to pay for his expenses and help his parents, he couldn't finish elementary school, but he would like to complete it someday.
On his own initiative, and thanks to his enthusiasm and the support from his family, Dionisio started his business growing prickly pears. He works approximately 10 hours a day. He feels very good in his business, since he has always enjoyed the country and the work that is done there.
Dionisio is very thankful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help he will be able to cover the expenses of introducing cochineal insects throughout his prickly pear crop. That way he can take advantage of the season and get an abundant cochineal insect breed, so that when he finishes harvesting his produce, he will be able to get good profits from his sales. This will help Dionisio to achieve, little by little, his biggest dream of prodiving his beloved family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to cover the expenses of introducing cochineal insects throughout his prickly pear crop.

loans.name: Farida

texts.en:
Farida is 34 years old and lives in the town of Kasubi in the Kampala east region of Uganda. She is married and has three children with two of them currently in school. For the past four years, Farida has been working hard to manage her small business, which sells garment clothes. 

To help expand her business, Farida has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more garment clothes for resale, and will help Farida to generate greater profits and send her children back to school. Farida hopes that in the future she will be able to complete her house and open up another shop in town. 

Farida is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Farida who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more garment clothes for resale.

loans.name: Carolyn

texts.en:
Carolyn is 36 years old and lives in the town of Kasubi in the Kampala east region of Uganda. She is married and has four children who are all currently in school. For the past five years, Carolyn has been working hard to manage her small business, which sells electronic items like energy saver bulbs. 

To help expand her business, Carolyn has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more electrical items like bulbs for resale, and will help Carolyn to generate greater profits and manage to build her residential house. Carolyn hopes that in the future she will be able to open up a wholesale electrical shop. 

Carolyn is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Carolyn who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more electrical items like bulbs for resale.

loans.name: Thamar

texts.fr:
Thamar  est née au Rwanda et a 50 ans. Elle est mariée avec 10 enfants de 9 à 28 ans, dont 9 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 5 ans de secondaire. 

Thamar est salariée. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter 250 pièces des chevrons, 10 pièces des tôles et payer le transport pour la réhabilitation de sa propre maison d’habitation.   

Thamar voudrait bâtir une maison moderne et forte.
texts.en:
Thamar was born in Rwanda and is 50 years old. She is married and has ten children, from 9 to 28 years old. Nine of the children have had schooling. She has five years of secondary education.

Thamar is salaried. This is her first loan cycle with the microfinance institution ACB. She is going to use her loan to buy 250 each of rafters and 10 lengths of sheet metal and to pay for transport for renovating her own house. 

Thamar would like to build a strong, modern house.

loans.use: to buy 250 each of rafters and 10 lengths of sheet metal and to pay for transport for renovating her own house

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru:
Зульфие 37 лет, одна воспитывает 3 детей. Зульфия с 1998 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 500 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Зульфии,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется 1 дойная корова с приплодом и 4 бычка, продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит около 10,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Зульфия обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку коровы.  Доходы от кредита Зульфия планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Zulfiya is 37 years old, she is raising three children. Since 1998 Zulfiya has been involved in animal husbandry, she started this business with an amount of 500 som (KGS). Because of her hard work Zulfiya now has one milk cow with calves and four bulls as well as the sale of milk and dairy products which brings around 10,000 som a month.

With a goal to further grow her business Zulfiya has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 60,000 KGS to buy a cow. She plans to invest the income from the loan into further increase of her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Rabiya

texts.ru:
Рабие 54 года, замужем, воспитала 4 детей – учитывая низкую занятость молодежи на местном рынке труда, сыновья Рабии находятся на заработках в России. Рабия с 2000 года занимается животноводством, ставшим основным источником дохода для ее семьи, начав этот бизнес с суммы 30,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Рабии,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется 1 дойная корова, две телки  и один бык, продажа молока и молочных продуктов местному перерабатывающему заводу  приносит около 6,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Рабия обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку 2 коров.  Доходы от кредита Рабия планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Rabiya is 54 years old, she has raised four children. Considering the low employment rate on the local labor market her sons are now working in Russia. Since 2000 Rabiya has been involved in animal husbandry, a business which became the main source of income for her family which she started with an amount of 30,000 som (KGS). Because of her hard work Rabiya now has one milk cow, two heifers and one bull as well as the sale of milk and dairy products to the local dairy factory which brings around 6,000 som a month.

With a goal to further grow her business Rabiya has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KGS to buy two cows. She plans to invest the income from the loan into further increase of her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase two cows.

loans.name: Lilya

texts.ru:
Лилия замужем. У нее есть взрослый сын. Лилия имеет свой собственный бизнес.

Лилия занимается продажей летней обуви и одежды  на протяжении 15 лет. Она имеет собственную торговую точку на центральном рынке. Лилия ответственная и трудолюбивая. Она всегда старается выбирать товар, который будет интересен покупателям.

Лилия просит предоставить ей кредит на сумму 7,000 гривен на закупку сезонного товара - тапочек, вьетнамок, шлепанцев, футболок, пр. Кредит поможет ей получить дополнительную прибыль и тем самым улучшить быть семьи.
texts.en:
Lilya is married. She has a grown son. Lilya has her own business, she sells summer shoes and clothing for the past fifteen years.

She has her own vendor spot on the central market. Lilya is responsible and hardworking. She always tries to select merchandise which will interest her customers.

She is asking to provide her with a loan in the amount of 7,000 hryvnia to buy seasonal merchandise such as slippers, flip flops, scandals, t-shirts, etc. The loan with help her get additional profit which will improve livelihood of her family.

loans.use: to buy slippers, flip flops, t-shirts, etc.

loans.name: Yeyssa

texts.fr: Yeyssa est une femme mariée.Elle est mère de cinq enfants.Deux de ses enfants fréquentent l'école primaire de son village alors que deux autres vont au collège située dans la plus proche ville, à cinq kilomètres.Yeyssa s'occupe des travaux domestiques de son ménage et pratique en même temps l'élevage de moutons et de chèvres.A l'approche de la fête de Tabaski, elle achète des moutons qu'elle engraisse puis revend à de bons prix.Cette activité lui permet de changer s garde robe, de renouveler l'habillement des enfants et de participer fortement aux dépenses d'alimentation de la famille.Afin de faire une nouvelle opération, elle sollicite un pret de 250000f pour acheter des moutons et de l'aliment bétail.
texts.en:
Yeyssa is a married woman and a mother of five children. Two of her children attend primary school in her village, while two others go to the middle school located in the nearest city, 5 km away. Yeyssa takes care of the housework in her home and simultaneously raises sheep and goats. 

As the Tabaski holiday approaches, she is buying sheep which she fattens and then resell at a good price. This business enables her to change her wardrobe, renew the children's clothing, and really help to cover her family's food costs. 

In order to restart, she is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs to buy sheep and some animal feed.

loans.use: to buy sheep and animal feed

loans.name: Ilimane

texts.fr: Monsieur Ilimane est un résident du Sénégal. Il est célibataire et exerce une double activité : il est à la fois  pêcheur et aviculteur. Ça fait plus de 3 ans qu’il est aviculteur et s’active dans le secteur de la pêche depuis plus de  20 ans. Il est un sociétaire de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC où il sollicite un crédit d’un montant de 300.000 francs CFA. Ce prêt lui permettra  de s’approvisionner en poussins et aliments  pour rendre son activité avicole   plus bénéfique. Par conséquent il aura l’opportunité d’épargner d’avantage d’argent afin de pouvoir un jour réaliser son projet futur qui consiste a bâtir un toit pour son foyer.
texts.en:
Mr. Ilimane is a resident of Senegal. He is unmarried and has dual work: he is both a fisherman and a poultry farmer. For over three years, he has been a poultry farmer and has been active in the fishing sector for over twenty years. 

He is a partner of a U-IMCEC branch office, where he is requesting a loan in the amount of 300,000 francs CFA. This loan will enable him to stock up on chicks and feed to make his poultry business worthwhile. Consequently, he will have the chance to save more money, so as to realize his future plans, consisting of building a roof for his home one day.

loans.use: to buy chicks and feed for business purposes
